articles.title: 2026 World Cup schedule: Everything we know about locations, dates, times, teams, tickets and more - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: The 2026 World Cup schedule is maddeningly complex. FIFA has revealed some details, but others won't be released until later.
articles.content:
The full 2026 World Cup schedule won't be finalized until December 2025, but FIFA revealed key details on Sunday. (Photo by Brennan Asplen/FIFA via Getty Images)

articles.title: PGA Tour cancels final round of AT&T Pebble Beach; Wyndham Clark declared winner - NBC Sports
articles.description: Because of ongoing weather concerns, the PGA Tour reduced the event to 54 holes.
